mapper.select: select su.id as id,su.name as name,cc.name as qname from SYS_ORGANIZATION o,SYS_DEPARTMENT su, (select o.name,o.id from SYS_ORGANIZATION o,SYS_DEPT_USER d,SYS_DEPARTMENT su where o.id=su.org_id and su.id=d.dept_id and d.user_id=#{ID}) cc where o.id=su.org_id and o.id=cc.id

select u.id as id ,u.display_name as displayName,cc.name as name from SYS_DEPT_USER d,sys_user u,(select su.id,su.name from SYS_DEPARTMENT su,SYS_DEPT_USER d,sys_user u where d.dept_id=su.id and d.user_id=u.id and d.user_id=#{ID})cc where d.dept_id=cc.id and u.id=d.user_id

select distinct (u.id) as id ,u.display_name as displayName,cc.name as name from SYS_DEPT_USER d,sys_user u,(select su.id,su.name from SYS_DEPARTMENT su,SYS_DEPT_USER d,sys_user u where d.dept_id=su.id and d.user_id=u.id and d.dept_id=#{ID})cc where d.dept_id=cc.id and u.id=d.user_id
